Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A younger half - sister , who had no underlying disease , was also found to lack immunochemically detectable C5 .

Let's think step by step.

1. Underlying disease: In this context, the term "underlying disease" refers to a pre-existing medical condition that the younger half-sister does not have. Therefore, "underlying disease" is an entity representing a health condition or disorder.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.
The younger half-sister had no "underlying disease".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
